phrs.translation: 颠簸, 震动, 震跳, 颠簸地移动

sentences.sentence: Install the jounce bumper on the upper spring mount.
sentences.translation: 在上部弹簧固定处安装避震器。

sentences.sentence: A little jounce rather than swaying. Put a little bump in your walk.
sentences.translation: 颠一颠宝宝，但不要大力摇晃，走路时可以轻轻蹦一蹦。

sentences.sentence: In China, North to Harbin, South to Qingjiang one line, West to Wuzhong one line, East to Bohai Gulf island and northeast Border Line. People of wide area felt egregious jounce.
sentences.translation: 在华夏大地，北至哈尔滨，南至清江一线，西至吴忠一线，东至渤海湾岛屿和东北国境线，这一广大地区的人们都感到异乎寻常的摇撼。
